sentences.en: A bone in my spine was out of alignment .
sentences.cn: 我的脊椎骨有一节脱位。

sentences.en: Don't arch your back, keep your spine straight.
He broke his spine in a fall from a horse.
sentences.cn: 他从马上跌下摔断了脊梁骨.

sentences.en: He felt the hardness of the iron railing press against his spine.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到硬邦邦的铁栏杆顶着自己的脊梁。

sentences.en: He suffered from curvature of the spine.
sentences.cn: 脊柱弯曲使他痛苦不堪。

sentences.en: The disease had deformed his spine.
The emptiness here sent shivers down my spine.
sentences.cn: 这里的空寂让我脊梁骨发凉。

sentences.en: The scream sent a prickle down my spine.
sentences.cn: 尖叫声听得我像针由上到下刺我的脊骨.

sentences.en: The story was so terrible that It'sent tremors down my spine.
sentences.cn: 这故事太可怕,它使我不寒而栗.

sentences.en: There was a pain then, a quick, blinding agony that jumped along Danlo's spine.
sentences.cn: 先是一阵疼痛，接着一股瞬间的剧痛沿着丹洛的脊柱窜了上来。

sentences.en: This movement lengthens your spine and tones the spinal nerves.
sentences.cn: 这一动作舒展脊椎，使脊神经更加强健。
威胁只能使他更加坚毅.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, as a standard mattress wears, the springs soften and so do not support your spine.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，当一张标准床垫用旧后，弹簧就会变软而无法支撑你的脊椎。

words.tran_cn: 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的
没有骨气的；无脊椎的；懦弱的
多刺的；麻烦的；尖刺状的
[解剖]脊柱，脊椎；[生物]刺；[印刷][图情]书脊

trans.tran_cn: 脊柱，脊椎，（动植物的）刺，书脊
trans.tran_en: the row of bones down the centre of your back that supports your body and protects your  spinal cord
